Replies.Author: Jack
Replies.Content:
Winter Break‚Äôs the best break. It‚Äôs not too short to get into a non-curricular activity (like Thanksgiving or Spring Breaks) or too long to get through without winding up bored (like Summer Vacation). There‚Äôs 4ish days left until classes start again, and I‚Äôm just about ready to get back into classes. Wish we could could swap to a year-round school year with WB-length vacations, but you know, politics. Or something.

Also, I _finally_ got through all the anime from Fall 2010 that I wanted to finish before putting together a ‚Äúyear in review‚Äù piece for the blog. (Well, I guess I have the Megana na Kanojo OVAs left) I would have finished earlier I think if not for the ridiculous rewards for a certain Wintersday quest in Guild Wars. Said quest rewards were farmed so hard by everyone (myself included) that _two sectors of the in-game economy all but crashed_. Ugh.

Now to go actually write that piece. Or read more HP and the Methods of Rationality. Hmmmm.

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Wow, fanfiction takes precedence over anime club? Wait a second, I‚Äôm not surprised by this at all! I finally gave you a user so you can post your list. I‚Äôm interested so feel free to make it happen.

I actually heard about the rewards wintersday (on /v/) because of all the bitching when the economy was dying. The rage was priceless.

Also Megane na Kanojo was pretty fun, they‚Äôre short, at least. Mercifully short, actually. üòâ

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
At least you watched anime, sir. I‚Äôm ashamed to say that I really didn‚Äôt get any viewing at all, except for rewatching some stuff I‚Äôve already seen (Disappearance, Girl Who Leapt Through Time, FLCL, stuff‚Ä¶). I guess there was that one episode of Amagami‚Ä¶

That is, unless playing the story mode in BlazBlue counts as watching anime. I guess the lack of actual _animation_ (unless seeing the portraits go omnomnom during dialogue counts) excludes it, though.

I‚Äôve seen the pilot of Dexter, and yeah, it doesn‚Äôt look too terrible. My better half is obsessed with the novels, so I end up hearing a lot about it, but I‚Äôve yet to try diving in.

Anyway, I don‚Äôt have anything particular to say about the coming semester‚Äôs shows, since I‚Ä¶ haven‚Äôt‚Ä¶ seen them, but I‚Äôm hoping for some good showings! I‚Äôll probably be pleased either way, though. I‚Äôm not exactly the most selective audience.

Replies.Author: Chris
Replies.Content:
Somehow looking forward to going back in a few days. Schedule‚Äôs a bit more open, and I‚Äôll actually be able to attend showings on time this semester. First half of winter was pretty much video games and anime (finished Mushishi), and second half went to recovering from wisdom teeth extraction, which means it also consisted of video games and anime (almost finished with Black Lagoon, which I am really enjoying).

Despite Winter 2011 failing to impress me, I‚Äôve decided to give it a chance, so I‚Äôll try to watch at least 2-3 episodes of everything that comes out. Infinite Stratos looks pretty much set to dive into the standard harem recipe (as if one couldn‚Äôt tell from the premise). Unless it deviates and gets interesting, fast, I probably won‚Äôt finish it. Or maybe I will ‚Äì I finished K-On!!, after all. Madoka gives me mixed feelings. It feels so ordinary and cliche, but the Shaft artstyle never fails to be interesting. It‚Äôs weird. It‚Äôs like being served Taco Bell on a silver platter, at a fancy restaurant, in an airport.

I‚Äôm waiting to see if anyone else is subbing Gosick before I reluctantly take the HS 480p. I hope a decent group subs it in HD, because it‚Äôs one of the few shows I was planning on watching this season anyway.I‚Äôm grabbing Cardfight now‚Ä¶although I can‚Äôt really say I‚Äôm looking forward to it.

Oh, right ‚Äì You can‚Äôt have Bad Anime Night when _every night_ is bad anime night! Ohohohohohohoho

Replies.Author: Daniel Pascua
Replies.Content: I agree that this break seems like just the right length, and I‚Äôm just starting to feel like going back to school again. I‚Äôve gotten into fighting games now so I‚Äôve spent most of my break playing Super Street Fighter 4 and Blazblue. You‚Äôll have to show me that Umineko game sometime Gene. üòÑ

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content: You got it Daniel, I already put it on the hard drive. I‚Äôll hook you up with it next time I see you üòÑ

Replies.Content:

40% of all ero dojinshi were of Kuroneko. Lol Japan‚Ä¶

Replies.Content:
also lolwtf‚Ä¶ people in this club play blazblue?

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
It‚Äôs so _anime_, I can‚Äôt not play it.

I‚Äôm also horrible, though, so I should probably just stop trying.

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Last time I played you I got my butt rocked

but good luck everyone else!
